data.title: 2024 Midwest Super Sophomore Games: Hitting Leaderboard
data.meta_description: In-depth look at some advanced Trackman and Blast metrics from the Showcase
data.text:
Prep Baseball Staff

We would like to thank all who participated in Prep Baseball's 2024 Midwest Super Sophomore Games. This was a great opportunity for 2027 prospects to be put on college radars. Many players impressed during their individual workouts at the showcase. Below we have the complete statistical results from the event as well as the top performers across various different categories.

Interested in attending a Prep Baseball event? Check out our schedule by clicking here.

Complete Statistics

To view the Positional Stats, Click Here.

To view the Pitching Stats, Click Here.

To view the Trackman Analytics, Click Here.

To view the Blast Analytics, Click Here.
